mapper.select: SELECT i.inventory_idx AS inventoryIdx, i.product_idx AS productIdx, i.lot_number AS lotNumber, i.quantity AS quantity, i.location_idx AS locationIdx FROM INVENTORY i WHERE i.location_idx = 9999

SELECT i.inventory_idx AS inventoryIdx, i.product_idx AS productIdx, i.lot_number AS lotNumber, i.quantity AS quantity, l.location_name AS locationName, l.location_type AS locationType FROM INVENTORY i JOIN WAREHOUSE_LOCATION l ON i.location_idx = l.location_idx WHERE l.location_type = 2

SELECT oi.product_idx AS productIdx, SUM(oi.quantity) AS totalOutbound FROM OUTBOUND_ORDER_ITEM oi JOIN OUTBOUND_ORDER o ON oi.outbound_order_idx = o.outbound_order_idx WHERE o.created_at >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY oi.product_idx
